name: Yume No Hitsuji
description:
Sorry for all the references to my poor time management :') Enjoy!!

Story:

Hitsuji has struggled all her life with a strange phenomenon: every time she talks to someone for a long period of time, they fall asleep! She's certain she must be the most boring person alive.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows (A and S) to move. Up (W) to Jump. Down (S) to change characters and Spacebar to interact/Use powers :)


Credits:

Programming & Art Assets: HamDogu

Music: hZA

Concept Art & Plot: Laura D
